gui.textual

Class Textual

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.textual.Textual
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GUI, Colors

    public class Textual
extends java.lang.Object
implements Colors, GUI
    GUI - Textual Mode
    Makes an implementation of the interface GUI for exhibiting the game, with colors, in a Unix shell.

    The program may also work if the shell accepts the ANSI Escape Codes.

    Author:
    Renato Cordeiro Ferreira

        public void paint()
        Description copied from interface: GUI
        Shows Map.
        Creates a Map with more details of each element of the scenarios and items in the map. Each hexagon represents one title.
        Specified by:

      • printMiniMap

        public void printMiniMap()
        Description copied from interface: GUI
        Shows Mini Map.
        Creates a Mini Map with dimensions MAP_SIZE x MAP_SIZE, with a one-character representation of each scenario/item in the map.
